Data: Edwards to Marsh, no run on target: It landed on a good length, around middle and off, moved towards the off stump, tapped to the off side
Edwards to Marsh, 5 wide well down the leg side and Ramdin can't reach. Blewett, on air, says the 'keeper could have done better than that.
Edwards to Marsh, 1 run on the leg and middle, full and turned to midwicket region for a single
Edwards to Watson, no run rushes through the off stump channel, Watson has a poke before withdrawing his bat
Edwards to Watson, 1 run shifts his weight to the back foot and steers a back-of-length delivery to third man
Edwards to Marsh, no run the first bouncer of the day and Marsh goes down under
Edwards to Marsh, 1 run short in length, around the off stump, dabbed to third man for a single
Powell to Marsh, no run good probing delivery, slanting across Marsh who lets it go through to Ramdin
Powell to Marsh, no run similar delivery and again left alone.
Powell to Marsh, no run lands outside off, on a length and moves further away, left alone
Powell to Marsh, no run back of length, cutting away from Marsh who mistimes a cut to point. Does some gardening down the track now.
Powell to Marsh, FOUR runs slashed to third man boundary. Width outside off and Marsh didn't quite go towards the line but went hard at the flash

Powell to Marsh, FOUR runs edged past the second slip. Fuller and around the off stump, Marsh pushes hard at it, bat well away from the body and watched it sail past the slip fielder. It would have gone straight to the third slip's hands.
Edwards to Watson, no run
Edwards to Watson, FOUR runs slings it full outside leg and Watson tickles it to the fine-leg region whwere Nikita Miller fumbles as he dives to his right
Edwards to Watson, no run lands full on the middle and swung away a touch, Watson is squared up as he is looking to dab across the line, adjusts to push it down the track

Edwards to Watson, no run a sharp bouncer on the left shoulder, Watson shapes to pull but doesn't connect well. The ball rolls towards midwicket. Fidel stares at Watson who has some thing to say back at Fidel
Edwards to Watson, no run short in length, leans forward to defend
Edwards to Watson, FOUR runs on the middle and leg, clipped off the pads to deep square leg boundary.
Powell to Marsh, no run outside the off stump and Ramdin gathers
Powell to Marsh, no run fuller, around the off stump, driven to mid-off
Powell to Marsh, no run length delivery around the off stump, steered to point
Powell to Marsh, 1 run run down to third man
Powell to Watson, no run rushing outside the off stump, left alone
Powell to Watson, FOUR runs quite similar to the last ball of the previous over. On the legs and Watto flicks it away to the deep square leg boundary.
Edwards to Marsh, no run on a length, around middle and leg, tries to turn it to the leg side and it runs off the pad to the off side
Edwards to Marsh, 1 run fuller, outside off stump and squeezed past covers
Edwards to Watson, no run length delivery around the off and middle, defended to the off side
Edwards to Watson, 1 run outside the off stump, full in length, Watson gets forward, opens the bat-face and runs it to third man
Edwards to Marsh, no run Marsh ducks into a bouncer.
Edwards to Marsh, no run fuller, on the middle and off and Marsh jabs it to point
Powell to Watson, 1 run full delivery coming in a touch and Watson defends and it runs off the inner edge to the on side
Powell to Marsh, no run kicks up from short of length, on the middle stump line, defended to the off side, thinks about a run and changes minds as Powell rushes across
Powell to Marsh, no run angled across Marsh who shoulders arms
Powell to Marsh, no run just outside the off stump, on a length, steered to point
Powell to Marsh, no run just outside the off stump, on a length, defended to covers
Powell to Marsh, no run slanted across Marsh who lets it go through to Ramdin
Edwards to Watson, no run full and well outside the off stump, swing and a miss
Edwards to Watson, no run not all that short but Watson goes for the pull and is beaten
Edwards to Watson, FOUR runs short in length and drifting towards middle and leg, Watson goes back and punches it through midwicket. Mere push and it fairly raced off the turf. Very fast outfield.
Edwards to Watson, 1 run gets forward to place a length delivery to right of mid-on for a single
Edwards to Marsh, no run leans forward to defend to the on side
Edwards to Marsh, no run leans forward to turn a full delivery to midwicket
Powell to Watson, 4 leg byes Banged in short and Watson goes for the pull and top edges it over Ramdin's head. Good pace and carry.
Powell to Watson, no run fuller and driven to mid-on.
Powell to Watson, no run another one dug in short but it tails down leg side
Powell to Watson, no run full pitched and Watson mistimes a drive to covers. He then remarks his guard with his spikes.

Powell to Watson, OUT First the bouncer, then the really full one and now the length delivery cutting in from outside off. Watson shapes to drive on the up and it runs off the inner edge to left of Ramdin
Powell to Hussey, no run gets on top of the bounce of a back-of-length delivery angling away from him and pushes it to covers
Edwards to Marsh, no run
Edwards to Marsh, no run a tad wide outside off and a touch short in length and Marsh goes for the cut, again reaching well away from him and gets a bottom edge to the off side
Edwards to Marsh, 1 run length delivery on the off and middle, played with soft hands to the off side and they cross over for a single

Edwards to Hussey, no run sharp, well-directed bouncer on the middle stump line and Hussey hops, takes hie eyes off but manages to drop the ball in front of him. The bottom-hand was taken of the handle and he got on top of the bounce
Edwards to Hussey, no run slings a full one around the off stump and Hussey leans forward to defend to covers
Edwards to Hussey, no run pushed across Hussey who lets it angle past him
Powell to Marsh, no run short in length, outside the off stump, mistimes the cut shot to covers.
Powell to Marsh, 1 run strays on to the legs, flicked to deep midwicket
Powell to Hussey, no run leans forward to defend to covers
Powell to Hussey, 1 run drifts to the legs again, placed to left of mid-on for a single
Powell to Marsh, 1 run again on the legs, off the length this time and tucked behind square leg
Powell to Hussey, FOUR runs shifts his line to outside off but Marsh is quick to lean across and creams it through covers
Bravo to Marsh, 1 run outside the off stump, steered to backward point
Bravo to Hussey, no run shout for lbw but the ball pitched outside leg stump before moving in to strike Hussey in front of the stumps.
Bravo to Hussey, no run outside the off stump, moving away, left alone
Bravo to Hussey, 2 runs back of length, on the leg and middle line, clipped past square leg
Bravo to Hussey, no run again on the pads, turned straight to square leg this time.
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run just outside the off stump, cut down to third man
Powell to Hussey, 2 runs short in length, outside the off stump, moving away and Hussey cuts to left of third man. Not much power behind that
Powell to Hussey, 1 run leans across to drive a full pitched delivery to sweeper cover
Powell to Marsh, no run short in length, on the middle and off, Marsh stays adjacent to the line, opens the bat-face and guides to backward point

Powell to Marsh, OUT Powell and Ramdin combo are at it again. It landed on the leg stump line, on a length and Marsh tried to play it through the on side but the ball cut across him and clipped the outer edge
Powell to Clarke, no run leans across, covers the off stump and lets a length delivery whiz past the off stump
Powell to Clarke, no run moves outside the off stump, left alone
Bravo to Hussey, no run fullish, on the middle and off, squeezed of the outer edge to backward point
Bravo to Hussey, no run gets forward and across and leaves a delivery moving outside the off stump
Bravo to Hussey, no run on the off stump and Hussey gets close to the line to defend to the off side
Bravo to Hussey, no run similar delivery and Hussey pushes it to covers
Bravo to Hussey, no run off cutter, moving from middle and off towards off, nudged to the off side
Bravo to Hussey, 2 runs fuller and Hussey leans forward to drive to left of deep cover for couple of runs
Powell to Clarke, no run cuts in from outside off stump, Clarke stands tall to punch it back down the track and Powell lunges to his right to make the stop
Powell to Clarke, no run fuller, shapes in from outside off and Clarke gets on to the front foot to nudge it to midwicket
Powell to Clarke, 1 run The debutante Miller makes a fab diving stop to his left at mid-off. It was crashed by Clarke and Miller made a fine half-stop
Powell to Hussey, 1 run the yorker on the middle and off, jabbed to left of mid-off for a quick single. There is a direct hit but Hussey is home
Powell to Clarke, 1 run banged in short, climbs chest-high around the off stump and run down to third man
Powell to Hussey, no run short in length, moving outside the off stump, worked to backward point
Bravo to Clarke, no run full, straight, outside off, Clarke has a flash and can't connect. Hussey has a word with him.
Bravo to Clarke, no run back of the length, outside off stump and Clarke punches it on the up and to left of short cover where Gayle makes a diving half stop
Bravo to Clarke, no run shout for lbw as the ball nips back to evade the waft and strikes him high on the pad
Bravo to Clarke, (no ball) Ah the first free hit of the game coming up as Bravo oversteps
Bravo to Clarke, 1 leg bye low full toss, on the leg side, Clarke opens his stance, has a swing, misses and it runs off the pads to the off side
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run slanted across him, cut down to third man
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run leans forward to drive to left of mid-off
Powell to Clarke, 2 runs slower one, full and on the middle, worked through wide mid-on. Clarke has reached 4000 ODI runs.
Powell to Clarke, no run dug in short, outside off, Clarke gets his bat in a horizontal position and taps the ball to point.
Powell to Clarke, 1 run short in length, outside off stump, pushed to cover point for a quick single
Powell to Hussey, no run another slower one, dabbed to backward point
Powell to Hussey, FOUR runs lovely off drive. He leaned into the shot and drove the full pitched delivery through wide mid-off region
Powell to Hussey, no run cutting away from Hussey who steers to backward point
Bravo to Clarke, no run full and outside off stump, bottom edges a square slash to the off side
Bravo to Clarke, FOUR runs leans forward to wrist a full length delivery on middle through wide mid-on region. Very well timed.
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run shifts his line to outside off stump, punched through cover point
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run leans forward to drive to right of mid-off and even though, Findlay fires in a direct hit at the striker's end, Clarke is home in time.
Bravo to Clarke, no run length delivery shaping in towards middle stump, pushed to mid-on
Bravo to Clarke, 3 runs drifts to the legs, flicked through midwicket region. Findlay slips while picking the ball and falls to the ground. By the time he recovers, they turn for the third run
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run gets forward to a length delivery and punches to left of mid-off
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run leans across to push to cover point for a single
Sammy to Clarke, FOUR runs fullish, on the middle and leg stump line, whipped to midwicket boundary. Good use of the wrists.
Sammy to Clarke, no run leans forward to defend to covers
Sammy to Clarke, no run slower one, shaping in to the off stump, worked to midwicket
Sammy to Clarke, no run leans forward to defend to mid-on
Bravo to Hussey, no run full and outside off stump, mistimes a square slash to point
Bravo to Hussey, no run further outside off, full, driven to covers
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run steered through backward point
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run full and on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
Bravo to Hussey, FOUR runs short and Hussey rocks back to pull to wide midwicket boundary
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run fuller and driven past the lunging short extra cover to mid-off
Sammy to Hussey, no run full pitched delivery around the off stump, driven to covers
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run a tad slower, a touch short in length, Hussey bends his back knee and taps the ball towards gully
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run full and outside off, driven to left of mid-off
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run leans forward to work a full one through midwicket
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run
Sammy to Hussey, no run full pitched outside off, driven to covers
Bravo to Clarke, FOUR runs Easy. Short and slipping down leg, pulled to fine-leg boundary
Bravo to Clarke, no run corrects his line, gets it towards off and middle, defended down the track
Bravo to Clarke, no run on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
Bravo to Clarke, no run fuller and on the middle, shaping in, flicked to midwicket
Bravo to Clarke, 1 run on the middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run outside off stump, steers to cover point region. Quick single and had the throw found the stumps, Clarke would have been run out.
Sammy to Hussey, no run short in length, outside the off stump, mistimes a cut to Sarwan at covers
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run just outside off stump, not much room but Hussey manages to open the bat-face and dab it to third man
Sammy to Clarke, no run bouncer and ducks under
Sammy to Clarke, no run almost scoops to short midwicket. It was a touch slower, off the scrambled seam, and Clarke was early into the forward push and it went in the air but fell short of Sarwan
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run leans forward to drive through the off side field
Miller to Clarke, 1 run keeps a touch low after landing on length outside off, driven to long-on
Miller to Hussey, no run leans forward to dab to midwicket
Miller to Hussey, 1 run on the off and middle, not much turn, reverse swept to short third man region
Miller to Clarke, no run floated on the off stump line, driven to long-off
Miller to Clarke, 1 run stays back to punch a short-in-length delivery to long-off
Miller to Hussey, no run on the off and middle, defended to the off side
Sammy to Clarke, no run short in length, coming into middle, turned to midwicket
Sammy to Clarke, 1 leg bye sliding on to the pads and the ball rolls towards midwicket
Sammy to Hussey, 1 run
Sammy to Clarke, 1 run banged in short and pulled to deep square leg fielder
Sammy to Hussey, FOUR runs comes down the track and drags a full delivery from outside off through wide mid-on region. Ugly but effective.
Sammy to Hussey, OUT the slog doesn't work this time. He cleared the front foot and swung a full delivery straight to deep midwicket.
Miller to Symonds, 1 run full and drifting in towards middle and off, Symonds pushes rather tentatively at that and edges to short third man
Miller to Clarke, 1 run leans forward to drive to long-on
Miller to Symonds, 1 run short in length, well outside off, Symonds goes back and across to carve it to deep cover
Miller to Clarke, 1 run leans forward to push a floater through cover point for a single
Miller to Symonds, no run beaten outside off stump. So far he has not got many to turn but this one did and spun past the outside edge
Miller to Symonds, 1 run full and straight, driven to long-off
Gayle to Symonds, no run well outside the off stump, Symonds lets it go
Gayle to Symonds, no run full and outside off, driven towards long-on but Chris Gayle gets across quickly to cut the single
Gayle to Symonds, no run on the back foot, punches to the on side of the track and Gayle makes the stop
Gayle to Symonds, no run goes back to push to extra cover
Gayle to Symonds, no run leans forward to defend
Gayle to Symonds, no run goes back to a quicker flatter delivery to defend
Miller to Clarke, 1 run leans forward to drive to long-off
Miller to Symonds, no run leans forward to defend
Miller to Symonds, no run floated on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Miller to Symonds, no run goes back to push to extra cover
Miller to Symonds, no run beaten. Again that rare turn and Symonds pushes inside the line
Miller to Symonds, no run outside off stump, no poke this time from Symonds
Gayle to Clarke, no run shout for lbw but Bucknor turns it down. Clarke misses the sweep and was struck in front of off stump. It would have hit the middle.
Gayle to Clarke, no run goes back to push to the off side
Gayle to Clarke, no run
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run short and outside off, going on straight, cut to deep point
Gayle to Symonds, FOUR runs Symonds has begun his show. He stretches forward to time a off drive sweetly and to wide long-off boundary
Gayle to Symonds, no run driven down the track
Miller to Clarke, 1 run short and outside off, cut to backward point
Miller to Symonds, no run leans forward to nudge to the on side
Miller to Symonds, no run leans forward to drive to covers
Miller to Symonds, 1 run drags it short and outside off, cut to deep point

Miller to Clarke, OUT another big shout for lbw and Asad Rauf lifts his finger after some delay. Another sweep that Clarke didn't connect but he was struck marginally outside the off stump. In the previous over, he survived a shout when he was hit
Miller to Hussey, no run low dipping full toss, stabbed towards Symonds and Nikita lunged to make the stop.
Gayle to Symonds, 1 run tucked away behind square for a single
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run a bit short and Hussey goes back to cut square and gets his first ODI run
Gayle to Symonds, 1 run Symonds forward and defends, they scamper through for one
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run pushed to cover and they get through for a single
Gayle to Symonds, 1 run driven down to long on and it's another easy run
Gayle to Hussey, 2 runs on the stumps, Hussey deliberately clips this one through square leg
Miller to Symonds, 2 runs outside off stump, Symonds goes down to paddle a sweep in the air safely down towards fine leg
Miller to Symonds, 1 run turned away fine once more, this time Findlay keeps it to one
Miller to Hussey, no run a touch short, Hussey tries to cut and slams it into the turf, a bit of a let-off for Miller
Miller to Hussey, 1 run fuller, but still pushed through quickly, and Hussey drives through cover
Miller to Symonds, 1 run width outside off again, Symonds cuts to deep point
Miller to Hussey, no run left alone outside off stump
Gayle to Symonds, 1 run fullish ball on off, Symonds squeezes a drive down to long on
Gayle to Hussey, no run driven back to the bowler
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run worked away through midwicket and there's easy runs there
Gayle to Symonds, 1 run Symonds tucks this one to fine leg
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run outside off and Hussey turns it easily behind square leg, just finding the gaps comfortably
Gayle to Symonds, 1 run driven back towards the bowler, Gayle tries to collect but collides slightly with Hussey, the ball gets past and the batsmen take a single
Miller to Symonds, no run a bit short, Symonds can't beat short cover
Miller to Symonds, no run left alone outside off
Miller to Symonds, no run straighter now from Miller, Symonds defends
Miller to Symonds, no run short and wide again, Symonds pinpoints extra cover
Miller to Symonds, no run cut in the air but it drops short of gully
Miller to Symonds, no run again Symonds can't find the gap through the off side, straight to extra cover
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run on the stumps, Hussey drives down to long on
Gayle to Symonds, 1 run quicker and flatter on the pads, Symonds turns it through midwicket
Gayle to Hussey, no run straight back to the bowler
Gayle to Hussey, no run driven to extra cover, can't beat the field
Gayle to Hussey, no run turned straight to midwicket
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run tossed up a little, on the pads and driven down to long on again
Miller to Hussey, no run leans forward to drive to the off side
Miller to Hussey, no run floated on the off stump, shapes to drive and it runs off the inner edge to the on side
Miller to Hussey, 1 run stays back to punch to deep cover
Miller to Symonds, FOUR runs slightly short of length, arm-ball on the off and Symonds stayed adjacent to the line and cut it superbly between backward point and short third man
Miller to Symonds, no run on the middle, defended back to the bowler
Miller to Symonds, 2 runs short, slower and cut to left of deep cover
Edwards to Hussey, no run slings a full one outside off stump, left alone
Edwards to Hussey, no run outside the off stump and left alone
Edwards to Hussey, no run short in length, outside off stump, punched to backward point where Chanderpaul makes a diving stop to his left
Edwards to Hussey, 2 runs leans forward to drive a full delivery to sweeper cover
Edwards to Hussey, 1 run tails in towards middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
Edwards to Symonds, no run fires in a bouncer and Symonds ducks
Miller to Hussey, 1 run leans forward to drive to long-off
Miller to Symonds, no run comes down the track, Miller drags back the length and Symonds stabs it off the inner edge to pad
Miller to Symonds, 2 runs goes back to force a short-of-length delivery to wide long-off
Miller to Symonds, SIX runs Superbly struck six over long-on. He leaned forward and decided to go through the line of the flighted delivery and it crash landed on the roof of the commentators box.
Miller to Symonds, 1 run
Miller to Hussey, FOUR runs short in length, outside off stump and cut well through backward point

Edwards to Symonds, FOUR runs Another boundary. Aussies are going for the kill. Short in length and outside off stump, Symonds waited before cutting it to left of backward point and well to the right of the wide third man
Edwards to Symonds, 2 runs on the legs, flicked to left of long leg where a diving stop is made
Edwards to Symonds, 1 run square driven to deep cover.
Edwards to Hussey, no run bouncer and Hussey goes down under. One for the over
Edwards to Hussey, 1 run well outside the off stump, David Hussey reaches out to slash it to sweeper cover
Edwards to Symonds, 1 run hits the deck short of length, climbs towards the rib cage, tickled to fine leg
Miller to Symonds, no run comes down the track, the length is shortened and he defends
Miller to Symonds, no run the arm-ball, just outside off, dabbed to short third man
Miller to Symonds, no run on the off stump, turned towards the on side and Miller scampers after to it make a diving stop
Miller to Symonds, no run just outside off, skids on, cut to backward point
Miller to Symonds, FOUR runs Not this time, though. Symonds backed away to cut it well to the right of the backward point fielder
Miller to Symonds, FOUR runs stretches across to sweep a full delivery from outside off to deep square leg boundary. He found the gap perfectly. 50 up. Symonds on the rampage.
Edwards to Hussey, 1 run on the off stump line, pushed towards sweeper cover for a single
Edwards to Symonds, 1 run short of length, skids on towards the off stump, Symonds chops it to third man
Edwards to Hussey, 2 runs back of length and outside off stump, cut hard to the left of third man where Fletcher makes a good tumbling stop. Gayle applauds the effort.
Edwards to Hussey, 1 run kicks up from short of length as it comes in, tucked behind square leg
Edwards to Symonds, no run hurls across a bouncer and Symonds lets it go over his shoulder
Edwards to Symonds, no run Another bouncer and Symonds ducks
Bravo to Hussey, no run really full and outside off, jabbed to the off side
Bravo to Hussey, no run full and outside off, Hussey tries to carve it through point and gets a thick under edge and to left of Ramdin
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run a tad slower, full and outside off, run down to third man for a single
Bravo to Symonds, no run yorker on the off and middle, dug out towards mid-on and Bravo cuts across to his right and dives acrobatically but can't reach and the ball rolls to mid-on
Bravo to Symonds, 1 run full pitched outside off, drilled to long-off
Bravo to Hussey, no run short of length, rushing through the off stump channel, Hussey cuts and misses
Powell to Symonds, FOUR runs low full toss on the middle, Symonds moves to the leg side and drives well to the right of sweeper cover. Lovely placement. No violence.
Powell to Symonds, 1 run just short of the blockhole, on the legs, turned past square leg
Powell to Hussey, 1 run slower, short in length and outside off, cut down to third man
Powell to Symonds, no run stabs a yorker on the middle and leg back down the wicket
Powell to Symonds, 1 wide spears down leg and Ramdin dives to collect
Powell to Symonds, 2 runs slower one, full and just outside leg, shoveled to deep backward square leg
Powell to Symonds, FOUR runs banged in short of length, coming into Symonds who arches back to play a neat short-arm pull to wide midwicket boundary.
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run moves outside the leg stump and crashes a full delivery on the off stump to deep cover
Bravo to Symonds, 1 run full and on the legs, nudged to the on side

Bravo to Hussey, SIX runs David Hussey, who sparkled in the IPL, joins in the fun. The left leg is cleared, the bat comes across and the short-of-length delivery disappears into the grassy banks at midwicket
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run fuller, whipped through the on side for a single
Bravo to Symonds, 1 run almost yorker length on the off and middle, pushed to long-off
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run full pitched just outside off, driven to deep cover
Miller to Hussey, no run short in length, outside off, dabbed to backward point
Miller to Hussey, 1 run comes down the track, Miller drags back the length again and Hussey has to be contend with a single with a tap to cover point

Miller to Symonds, FOUR runs Hammered to deep extra cover boundary. This is wonderful batting. Not too many risks but he is upping the ante at will. He rocks back to force a short-of-length delivery through the off side.
Miller to Symonds, FOUR runs Oh the reverse sweep but played back of the bat! He didn't bother to switch to the front side and paddled a length delivery on the middle to third man boundary.
Miller to Symonds, 1 run leans forward to work through midwicket
Miller to Hussey, 1 run goes back to push a delivery outside off to covers
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run full pitched on the middle and leg, turned to deep midwicket
Bravo to Symonds, 1 wide yorker length delivery but slips down leg
Bravo to Symonds, no run well-directed yorker on the middle, stabbed to the on side, Bravo cuts across the pitch and dives to prevent the single
Bravo to Symonds, 1 run yorker length again, on the off stump line, jabbed to point
Bravo to Hussey, 1 run clears the front foot and drags the really full delivery to square leg

Bravo to Symonds, no run the yorkers keep coming from Bravo. This one is jabbed out to the on side, Bravo rushes across and fires in a throw at the striker's end where Symonds dives to get back. But had Bravo hit the stumps, Symonds would have been
Bravo to Symonds, 1 run comes down the track, moves outside leg and drills a full pitched delivery on the stumps to long-off

Powell to Symonds, SIX runs Brutal. Super clean swing of the bat and the ball has disappeared over long-on. He moved outside leg. The bat came down. Met the ball flush in the middle. The white ball soared into the orbit.
Powell to Symonds, FOUR runs low full toss on the pads as he tried to follow Symonds who had stepped outside leg and Symonds swings it to deep backward square leg boundary.
Powell to Symonds, no run moves outside the leg, has a big swing towards wide long-on, inside edges to short fine-leg. He then practices hitting into the V
Powell to Symonds, 1 run low full toss on the leg stump, Symonds was outside leg and flashes it to long leg
Powell to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey follows Symonds. He steps down leg, the bowler follows him and he swings the full delivery to left of long leg where its kicked away into play
Powell to Hussey, SIX runs he threatens to moves towards off before going outside leg and slices a full delivery in the slot over long-off. The carnage continues.

Edwards to Symonds, OUT steps down the track, clears the front foot in an effort to the get the bat swing going but Edwards fires it short of length and on the off stump. Symonds tries to flat-bat it over the off side but couldn't clear the fielder
Edwards to Hopes, OUT Short delivery, Hopes tries to whip pull it but top edges a dolly to midwicket.
Edwards to Hussey, (no ball) 1 run full delivery, driven to long-off.
Edwards to Ronchi, 1 run moves outside leg and drives hard and straight to covers where Gayle takes the 'catch'
Edwards to Hussey, 1 run yorker on the middle, he can't get under the ball and digs it out to the on side
Edwards to Ronchi, 1 run back of length, cutting in to off and middle, pushed to cover point
Edwards to Hussey, 1 run another yorker on the middle, manages to dig it out to slips. Very good over this
Gayle to Hussey, 1 run driven past the diving bowler to long-off
Gayle to Ronchi, 2 runs floated full outside off, square driven to left of deep cover
Gayle to Ronchi, 1 run leans forward to work a full delivery through midwicket
Gayle to Hussey, OUT The low full toss does the trick. David skipped down the track and swung a dipping delivery to the substitute fielder at deepmidwicket
Gayle to Ronchi, 1 run
Gayle to Lee, 1 leg bye short in length, on the middle, tucked to square leg
Edwards to Lee, 1 run bangs it short of length and it cuts back in at Lee who had moved outside leg. Lee was cramped up, took his eyes off the ball but manages to dab it to the off side
Edwards to Ronchi, 1 run clears his front leg and slices a full delivery on middle and off to sweeper cover.
Edwards to Lee, (no ball) short in length and rushing through the off stump channel, Lee is outside leg, tries to cut but misses. But a free hit coming up
Edwards to Lee, no run digs it short, Lee is outside leg again, hops to cut but is beaten by the extra bounce and edges it to the 'keeper.

Edwards to Lee, 1 run another short--pitched delivery, mistimes a pull between midwicket and deep square leg. Sarwan runs back, Findlay runs in and both stop and assume the other will take the catch and it drops right in middle of them
Edwards to Ronchi, 1 run full delivery, jabbed away for a single
Edwards to Lee, 1 run moves away and mistimes a cut to covers
Bravo to Lee, 1 run a tad slower, full, driven to long-off.
Bravo to Ronchi, FOUR runs full and swinging away from the off stump, Ronchi was moving outside leg, stopped his movement, crouched, reached out to slice it through backward point
Bravo to Ronchi, OUT full in length, swung straight to long-off. The average first-innings score on this ground is 284

Bravo to Lee, 2 runs steps down leg side, Bravo follows him with a low dipping full toss, scooped to front of square leg and Chanderpaul rushes from short fine leg, dives and almost gets under the ball.
Bravo to Lee, 1 run yorker, stabbed to covers. Bravo has bowled very well in the end overs
Bravo to Johnson, no run finishes things off with a dot ball. He moved outside leg, Bravo fired in a low full toss outside off. Swing and a miss.
Australia end up on 282, just two short of the average first-innings score on this ground. Can West Indies chase it? Join us in a short while to find out.
All ready for the chase
Lee to Gayle, 1 run full delivery, hint of swing, on the off stump, squeezed to point
Lee to Marshall, no run Two slips in place and they watch as Xavier Marshall shoulders arms to a delivery outside off

Lee to Marshall, OUT Plumb. Lee didn't even appeal initially as he ran on straight before turning to query Bucknor. Full, fast, tailing into middle and leg and the tentative Xavier is caught on the shuffle. Gone.

Lee to Sarwan, FOUR runs lovely straight drive to start off. He stayed beside the line of a full and straight delivery on the middle and presented the full face of the blade. Mere push and it raced away.
Lee to Sarwan, FOUR runs shifts his line to outside off and Sarwan creams the full delivery though covers. Sweetly timed.
Lee to Sarwan, 1 run on a length, just outside off, Sarwan stays back, hops and punches it to covers
Bracken to Sarwan, 1 wide swings down leg. Slip and short midwicket in place. It did curve back in. If he gets it to start from off and middle, it could get interesting
Bracken to Sarwan, no run pushes this one across Sarwan, with the angle, left alone
Bracken to Sarwan, no run full, slanting away from Sarwan who drives to covers
Bracken to Sarwan, no run cuts away off the length, across Sarwan who is squared-up and pushes it to point
Bracken to Sarwan, no run length delivery angling towards off, pushed down the track and Bracken fields
Bracken to Sarwan, no run slanted across Sarwan who lets it go through to Ronchi
Bracken to Sarwan, 1 run turns a full delivery to long leg
Lee to Sarwan, no run full and straight on the off and middle, driven to mid-off. Sarwan is looking to be positive here
Lee to Sarwan, no run short of length, outside off, Sarwan goes hard at the cut shot and bottom edges it to the off side.
Lee to Sarwan, FOUR runs blasted to deep point boundary. More width than the previous delivery, similar short of length and Sarwan goes back and across to cut it hard.
Lee to Sarwan, no run fuller, closer to the off stump, no swing, driven to mid-off
Lee to Sarwan, no run back of length, outside off, tapped to covers
Lee to Sarwan, no run short in length and outside off, Sarwan goes for his cut shot but mistimes it to right of Clarke at backward point
Bracken to Gayle, no run outside the off stump line, steered to backward point.
Bracken to Gayle, no run pushes a length delivery to short mid-off
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run fuller, coming in towards middle, tucked behind square leg
Bracken to Sarwan, 1 run back of length, on the middle, turned to backward square leg region for a single

Bracken to Gayle, FOUR runs edged past the first slip. It held its line after landing on a length around off stump, Gayle played inside the line, tried to withdraw his bat but it ran off the outer edge past the diving Watson
Bracken to Gayle, FOUR runs The Gayle pull. Short of length, coming into him and he lifts his right leg and fists the ball through front of square
Lee to Sarwan, no run shuffles across to steer a full delivery to point
Lee to Sarwan, 1 run short in length, outside off stump, dabbed to third man for a single.
Lee to Gayle, 1 run digs it short on middle and leg, Gayle short-arm jabs it to long leg
Lee to Sarwan, no run banged in short and it whizzes past Sarwan who withdraws the bat away from the line and lets it fly past him
Lee to Sarwan, 1 wide well outside off stump, Sarwan can't connect with the cut shot.
Lee to Sarwan, no run stands on his toes to punch a back-of-length delivery just outside off to Symonds at covers
Lee to Sarwan, no run lets this one go through to Ronchi
Johnson to Gayle, no run full and on the leg and middle, turned straight to short midwicket
Johnson to Gayle, no run shifts his line to outside off, Gayle thinks about driving before lifting the bat above his head and Ronchi comes into play
Johnson to Gayle, 2 runs kicks up from short of length outside off stump, Gayle cuts to deep backward point
Johnson to Gayle, no run slings a full delivery from almost round-arm action on the middle and off , defended down the track.
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run pushes another full delivery to extra cover
Johnson to Sarwan, no run outside off, left alone
Lee to Gayle, FOUR runs And Lee bangs a short one on the leg stump line. Up goes the front leg, down comes the bat and he laps it around the corner to fine leg
Lee to Gayle, SIX runs Wallop. He cleared the front foot and killed a full delivery over wide long-on.
Lee to Gayle, no run shifts his line to outside off and is guided to backward point
Lee to Gayle, 1 run full pitched outside off stump, Gayle goes hard at his drive, the bat-face shuts and the ball rolls to left of mid-off
Lee to Sarwan, no run short of length, holding its line outside off, defended down the track

Lee to Sarwan, no run leans across to push a full length delivery to Clarke at backward point who fields and runs to his left and to his right as he shouts words of encouragement to his team-mates. Nervous energy.
Johnson to Gayle, no run on the off stump line, off a length, defended down the track. Slip and short straightish midwicket in
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run back of length, coming in to Gayle who nudges it toward square leg
Johnson to Sarwan, 1 run overpitched outside off, driven to right of extra cover where Symonds makes a diving stop
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run short in length, outside the off stump, tapped to right of backward point
Johnson to Sarwan, 1 run length delivery pushed across Sarwan who taps it close on the off side and rushes across for a single
Johnson to Gayle, no run short in length, outside the off stump, pushed to the off side
Hopes to Sarwan, no run full delivery on the middle, driven to Lee at mid-on
Hopes to Sarwan, no run
Hopes to Sarwan, no run coming in towards the middle and off, defended to covers
Hopes to Sarwan, no run on the middle, tailing towards middle and leg, turned to short midwicket
Hopes to Sarwan, 1 run outside the off stump, steered to third man
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run full delivery on the middle, pushed to long-on
Johnson to Gayle, no run leans forward to drive to covers
Johnson to Gayle, no run on the leg and middle, kicking up back of length, dabbed to midwicket
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run run down to third man. 50 up.
Johnson to Sarwan, no run full pitched outside off, driven to extra cover
Johnson to Sarwan, 1 run short in length, outside off, cut to third man
Johnson to Gayle, no run down the leg side, doesn't connect with the flick shot
Hopes to Sarwan, no run on a length, coming in, pushed to the on side
Hopes to Sarwan, 1 run back of length, on the middle, tickled behind square leg
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run full and around the leg stump line, nudged to square leg
Hopes to Sarwan, 1 run gets forward to push towards mid-on
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run fullish outside off stump, driven to long-off
Hopes to Sarwan, no run full pitched outside off, mistimes a drive to covers
Johnson to Gayle, no run almost yorker length on the middle and off, driven to mid-off
Johnson to Gayle, no run similar length again, on the middle, jabbed down the track
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run short of length, steered to third man
Johnson to Sarwan, no run leans forward to push to point
Johnson to Sarwan, 1 run kicks up from back of length, at the body, fended behind square leg
Johnson to Gayle, no run length delivery outside off, guided to point
Hopes to Sarwan, 1 run on the middle and leg, turned past square leg
Hopes to Gayle, no run cutting across Gayle who tries to run it through vacant slip region and is beaten. Ronchi is standing up to the stumps
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run low full toss, driven to long-off. I thought he was trying to drive through on side. Yep, the replays confirm that
Hopes to Sarwan, no run tailing into pads, misses to connect with his waft across the line and it rolls away to the on side off the pad
Hopes to Sarwan, no run leans forward to steer a seam-up delivery outside off to short third man
Hopes to Sarwan, no run on the middle, coming in, nurdled to square leg
Johnson to Gayle, no run full and outside off stump, left alone
Johnson to Gayle, no run fullish, on the off and middle, pushed to the off side
Johnson to Gayle, 5 wide bangs in a bouncer but it's too high and Ronchi is no superman to bring it back down to earth
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run leans forward to push to extra cover
Johnson to Sarwan, no run
Johnson to Sarwan, no run full pitched, driven to extra cover
Johnson to Sarwan, no run on the middle and leg, nudged to the on side
Hopes to Gayle, SIX runs breaks free with a lovely caressed straight drive. Er no. Wallops a full delivery to the straight boundary. What bat speed.
Hopes to Gayle, FOUR runs More violence. The front foot was cleared and he swung a low full toss to wide midwicket boundary.
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run reaches out for a full delivery outside off, the bottom-hand comes off the handle as he shapes to drive and he drags it to long-on
Hopes to Sarwan, no run back of length, skids on towards middle, stabbed to the off side
Hopes to Sarwan, 1 run outside the off stump, dabbed to third man
Hopes to Gayle, 2 runs short in length, moves towards leg stump, clipped off the pads for couple of runs
Johnson to Sarwan, no run full and angling away from Sarwan who fails to connect with a cover drive.
Johnson to Sarwan, no run on the off stump line, Sarwan shuffles across, tries to work it to the on side but can only send it back to the bowler.

Johnson to Sarwan, no run how does a top-order batsman like Sarwan gets squared up so often? It's a wonder. Again squared-up, to a delivery on the off and middle and gets a leading edge down the track
Johnson to Sarwan, 1 run short of length outside off, cut to covers
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run short in length, coming in to Gayle who turns it past square leg
Johnson to Sarwan, 1 run on the middle and off, this time he stays adjacent to the line and runs it down to third man
Hopes to Sarwan, 1 run on the middle and leg, turned to square leg
Hopes to Gayle, no run short in length, cutting away from Gayle who is squared-up and adjusts to jab it to the point region
Hopes to Gayle, no run outside off, left alone.
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run well outside the off stump, full, Gayle reaches out to slice it to deep cover
Hopes to Sarwan, 1 run leans forward to work a length delivery through midwicket
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run short of length, short-arms it towads deep midwicket. 50 for the skipper.
Johnson to Gayle, no run leans forward to push a full delivery to mid-on
Johnson to Gayle, no run short in length, outside off stump, punched to point
Johnson to Gayle, no run full and just outside the off stump, pushed to covers
Johnson to Gayle, 1 run outside the off stump, squeezed to wide third man
Johnson to Sarwan, 2 runs full pitched outside off, driven to left of sweeper cover
Johnson to Sarwan, 1 run back of length, on the middle and leg, clipped to long leg
Hussey to Sarwan, FOUR runs Sarwan welcomes him with a well-timed and even better, well-placed cover drive ,. well to the right of the sweeper cover
Hussey to Sarwan, 1 run stretches across to get a single to point region
Hussey to Gayle, 1 run from round the stumps, full and on the middle, driven to long-off
Hussey to Sarwan, no run goes back to turn a delivery turning into him to Hopes at square leg
Hussey to Sarwan, 2 runs short of length, outside off, cut to deep point
Hussey to Sarwan, 1 run
Watson to Sarwan, no run fullish, on the off stump line, driven back down the track
Watson to Sarwan, 1 run short in length, lapped around the corner behind square leg
Watson to Gayle, 1 run dabbed to third man for yet another single
Watson to Sarwan, 1 run leans forward to work it to the on side
Watson to Gayle, 1 run low full toss outside off stump, slashed to deep cover
Watson to Sarwan, 4 leg byes slips down leg side, misses the glance and it runs off the pad to fine leg boundary
Hussey to Gayle, 1 wide down the leg side
Hussey to Gayle, 1 run driven powerfully to long-on
Hussey to Sarwan, 1 run leans forward to ease a full delivery to long-on
Hussey to Gayle, no run really full delivery outside off, jabbed to David
Hussey to Gayle, 1 run gets forward to tap a delivery outside off to backward point
Hussey to Sarwan, SIX runs Shot boss. He waltzed down the track, reached the pitch and lifted a flighted delivery straight over the bowler's head.
Hussey to Sarwan, 1 run skips down to drive to long-off. 50 for Sarwan
Watson to Sarwan, 1 run on the pads, turned to long leg
Watson to Gayle, no run back of length, outside off stump, skids on to Gayle who chops it to backward point
Watson to Gayle, 1 run slower one, full, square drive through cover point
Watson to Sarwan, 1 run full length delivery outside off, guided to Lee at third man
Watson to Gayle, FOUR runs Low full toss. The bat comes down. Blink. The ball is picked up from extra cover boundary
Watson to Gayle, no run leans forward to defend down the track
Bracken to Sarwan, 1 run outside the off stump, cut down to third man
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run back of length, coming in, punched to long-on
Bracken to Sarwan, no run pushes a length delivery to the off side
Bracken to Sarwan, 1 run short in length, sits up outside off and Sarwan flat-bats it to long-off.
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run short in length, forced to long-on
Bracken to Sarwan, 1 run on the leg and middle, worked past square leg. Three Aussies converge on the ball.
Lee to Sarwan, FOUR runs Oh ho Sarwan has creamed that. He backed to the legside and slapped a short-of-length delivery just outside off stump. Talk about intent.
Lee to Sarwan, FOUR runs And now a delicate late cut. He waited for the ball to come to him, opened the bat-face and glided it through vacant slip region
Lee to Sarwan, no run The bouncer. Sarwan pulls but bottom edges it to the ground and Ronchi dives. The battle is on

Lee to Sarwan, OUT Lee takes out Sarwan. It kicked up from short of length and came in from outside off, Sarwan wanted to punch it square off the back foot, the bat went outside the line and he feathered a inner edge. Enter Chanders.
Lee to Chanderpaul, no run short in length, outside off, dabbed to point
Lee to Chanderpaul, no run gets behind the line of a short-of-length delivery and turns it to the on side.
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run on the middle and leg, turned to deep midwicket
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run short of length outside off stump, nudged to the on side.
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run full length outside off stump, steered to backward point
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run kicks up from a length, Chanderpaul looks to defend, is surprised at the extra bounce, takes the bottom-hand off the handle and jabs the ball to the on side
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run leans forward to turn a full length delivery behind square leg
Bracken to Gayle, no run slips to the pads, turned straight to Lee at short fine leg.
Lee to Chanderpaul, no run
Lee to Chanderpaul, FOUR runs short in length and outside off stump, Chanderpaul gets up and running with a cut shot.
Lee to Chanderpaul, no run swing and a miss. Full, outside off stump, Chanderpaul slashed hard but no wood on leather
Lee to Chanderpaul, FOUR runs Chanders pings the extra cover boundary. He went down on his knee to scoop a full delivery - a slower one - outside off over the off side field
Lee to Chanderpaul, no run short in length and outside off, cut to backward point
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run fuller, driven towards mid-off for a quick single.
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run on the middle stump line, wristed to deep square leg region for a single
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run short in length, outside off stump, pushed down to long-on for a single
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run short in length and Chanderpaul fetches it from outside off and drags his pull to long leg
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run on the middle and leg, nudged to midwicket region for a quick single. The bearded Symonds with the throw but he misses and Gayle survives
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run leans forward to turn a full length delivery to Symonds. They don't attempt a run now
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run on the middle and off, turned around the corner to the right of Lee at short fine leg
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 wide The high bouncer. It sails well above Chanderpaul
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run fuller, on the middle and leg, tries to turn it to square leg and gets a leading edge t o third man
Lee to Gayle, (no ball) the yorker ends up as a low full toss, pushed down the track. Free hit coming up folks

Lee to Gayle, SIX runs The slow bouncer, Gayle waits before pulling it to deep midwicket boundary. Tragi comedy there. Marsh has his eyes fixed on the ball which sails over him and he trips over the boundary hoardings.
Lee to Gayle, no run pushed to the off side
Lee to Gayle, no run leans forward to push a full delivery back to Lee
Lee to Gayle, no run length delivery on the off and middle, squeezed to cover point
Lee to Gayle, 1 run tip and run. Pushed to mid-off and Gayle retains the strike with a quick dash across
Bracken to Gayle, no run leans forward to jab a length delivery coming in to the middle. Scrambled seam and Gayle was early into the drive and edges it to his pad
Bracken to Gayle, no run back of length, just outside off, punched back to the bowler.
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run on the hips, tucked to left of midwicket.
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run cut and a miss. Short of length delivery outside off and Chanderpaul goes for the shot
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run steered to the off side
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run punched to long-on for a single
Clarke to Gayle, FOUR runs floated outside off stump, full and Gayle murders it to long-on boundary. Wham.
Clarke to Gayle, no run driven back to the bowler
Clarke to Gayle, 1 run leans forward to on drive to long-on
Clarke to Chanderpaul, no run dips in front of the middle, full, worked to midwicket

Clarke to Chanderpaul, no run leans forward to wrist a full delivery to midwicket
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run turned past square leg
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run gets behind the line of a length delivery and works it past square leg for a single.
Bracken to Gayle, 1 run on the pads, turned to right of short third man and Lee fires in a throw at the non-striker's end. Gayle is in. The ball misses the stumps.
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run length delivery on the off stump, pushed to point
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run slower one, shapes in from outside off, turned to midwicket
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run short of length, turned to long leg
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run back of length, outside off, cut to backward point
Watson to Chanderpaul, 1 run outside the off stump, run down to third man
Watson to Gayle, no run leans forward to push a length delivery to mid-off
Watson to Gayle, 1 run full and on the middle, squeezed to left of point
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run on the middle and off, turned to midwicket
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run leans forward to push a full delivery through the on side
Hopes to Gayle, no run
Hopes to Gayle, no run 0n the middle and leg, clipped to midwicket. Clarke fields and turns around to have a shy at the non-striker's end
Hopes to Gayle, 2 runs short in length, on the leg stump line, clipped off the pads to deep square leg
Hopes to Gayle, no run short in length, skidding outside off, pushed to covers
Hopes to Gayle, SIX runs Massive! Imperious. He moved the front leg out of the way and muscled a length delivery to wide long stands. West Indies now need 97 to win
Hopes to Gayle, 1 run fuller, outside off, dragged to long-on
Watson to Gayle, no run on a length, outside off stump, cut down to point
Watson to Gayle, no run on a length, moving away from Gayle who steers to backward point
Watson to Gayle, no run and again. Three dot balls. Watson who likes to bowl short normally has kept them fuller today
Watson to Gayle, 1 wide Perhaps thinking Gayle will go after this ball, pushes it well wide off the off stump

Watson to Gayle, OUT Australia break through. Watto strikes. Hopes takes a very good catch. Gayle's fine innings comes to an end. He wanted to swing a full delivery to the leg side but ended up slicing it high in the air towards cover point. It cam
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run turned to midwicket
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run
Hopes to Bravo, 1 run fullish, just outside off stump, pushed past the bowler
Hopes to Chanderpaul, FOUR runs Chanders takes over. He thrust his front foot out and lifted a length delivery over wide mid-on region. 90 from 94 balls.
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run clips this one to right of long leg.
Hopes to Bravo, no run comes in from just outside off, punched to Symonds at extra cover.
Hopes to Bravo, 2 runs he leans across to place a ball from outside off stump through wide mid-on region
Hopes to Bravo, 1 run punches to long-on for a single.
Watson to Bravo, no run leans forward to turn to midwicket
Watson to Bravo, no run full again, outside off stump, pushed to left of mid-on where Symonds - he seems to be every where - dives to make the stop.
Watson to Bravo, 1 run on the pads, turned to long leg for a single
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run leans forward to drive to mid-off
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run well outside the off stump, a tad slower and Chanderpaul fails to connect with his cut shot
Watson to Chanderpaul, 1 run glances to deep backward square leg for a single. 84 from 84 now.
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run short in length, just outside the off stump, Chanderpaul cuts but straight to backward point. Tense faces in the stands. 84 from 83.
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 1 run fuller, on the middle and leg, flicked to Lee at fine leg
Johnson to Bravo, no run shout for a catch down the leg side as Bravo misses the glance and it brushes the hip en route to Ronchi.
Johnson to Bravo, no run short in length, pushed to the on side
Johnson to Bravo, 1 run leans across to square drive on the up to deep cover
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 1 run short of length, outside off stump, Chanderpaul cuts it down to third man for a single.

Watson to Chanderpaul, FOUR runs slashed through the vacant slip region. Short in length and cutting away from Chanderpaul who went back and across and went hard with his cut shot. It flew off the outer half of the blade
Watson to Chanderpaul, no run oh he tries to sweep, yes sweep, Watson from well outside and misses. Chanderpaul is looking to go after Watto here
Watson to Chanderpaul, 1 run outside the off stump, mistimes the cut and will rush across for a quick single
Watson to Bravo, FOUR runs slips down leg, Bravo flicks it very fine. 211 for 3.
Watson to Bravo, no run leans forward to push a length delivery to covers
Watson to Bravo, 1 wide wide down the leg side. 71 from 73 and Watson runs to the top of his run up.
Watson to Bravo, 1 run turns a length delivery from outside off to long-on for a single. The batsmen get across to have a chat
Johnson to Bravo, no run leans forward to drive a full delivery to Symonds at extra cover.
Johnson to Bravo, no run
Johnson to Bravo, 1 run banged in short on the leg side. Bravo mistimes the pull to leg slip region. It went off his gloves
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 1 wide wide down the leg side. Ronchi does well to collect that. Johnson is furious with himself.
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 1 run short in length and coming into Chanderpaul who rocks back to pull to deep midwicket. He then suggests he should have got it squarer.
Johnson to Bravo, no run on the middle and leg, nudged to midwicket

Johnson to Bravo, 1 run stands tall to punch a back-of-length delivery to Symonds. They think about a run, Symonds tries to kill the thought with a direct hit at the striker's end but it ricochets off the stumps for the overthrows.
Bracken to Bravo, FOUR runs Bravo goes down town. Full pitched and driven beautifully down the ground. All along the carpet
Bracken to Bravo, SIX runs Fabulous extra-cover drive. Sensational hit. It was a length delivery around the off stump and he leaned into the shot and lifted it inside-out over the off side field.
Bracken to Bravo, no run leans forward to defend
Bracken to Bravo, no run short of length delivery on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
Bracken to Bravo, 1 run leans forward to push to the on side and runs with the stroke
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run pushed to the on side and is cut off the straightish midwicket fielder.
Johnson to Bravo, no run short in length and angling away from Bravo who has a huge flash at it. The crowd sigh in relief that he didn't get a nick
Johnson to Bravo, 1 run stands tall to punch a length delivery to long-off
Johnson to Chanderpaul, no run slings in a full delivery, tailing in to the middle, worked to midwicket
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 5 wide Pressure. Wide outside leg stump and Ronchi dives but can't prevent it from running to the boundary. Clarke holds his head. Agony. Crowd show their joy.
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 1 run short in length, outside off stump, cut past point.
Johnson to Bravo, 1 run fuller, on the middle and leg, pushed to long-on
Johnson to Chanderpaul, 1 run Chanderpaul retains the strike with a drive to long-on
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run outside the off stump, cut down to third man

Bracken to Bravo, 1 run Bravo opens the bat-face and runs a length delivery to third man. Bravo waits to see whether it has crossed the backward point fielder before he runs. Once they complete the single, Chanderpaul has a chat with Bravo.
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run full and just outside off, squeezed down to third man
Bracken to Bravo, 1 run length delivery on the middle and leg, tapped to left of short fine leg
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run slower one outside off stump, gets a under edge on the waft and will pick up a single to right of third man
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run angling across Chanderpaul who opens the blade and runs it to third man
Hopes to Bravo, no run short in length, moving towards legs , Bravo tries to pull it, misses and it strikes the pad
Hopes to Bravo, 2 runs fuller and outside off, lifted inside-out to left of long-off where Johnson makes a sliding stop
Hopes to Bravo, 1 run short and on the middle and leg, drags his pull to long leg
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run driven to long-off for a single. 36 from 43

Hopes to Bravo, OUT Clatter. The off cutter, full in length, shaping in towards the middle and off, Bravo plays all around it. Yet another twist. Australia continue to hustle. West Indies fight on. 36 from 42 and this dead-rubber is alive and kicki
Lee to Chanderpaul, no run full and angling down leg, brushes the pad and goes to Ronchi
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run on the middle and leg, off a length, clipped to deep midwicket

Lee to Findlay, no run fires in a 88.7 mph yorker swinging in on the middle and leg line, some how he manages to get his bat down and stabs it down the track. = What a delivery to receive first up in your international career.
Lee to Findlay, 1 leg bye follows up the yorker with a bouncer. Findlay takes his eyes off and ducks. The ball crashes into his back and rolls to short fine leg region.
Lee to Chanderpaul, no run leans forward to push to the off side
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run short in length, mistimes his pull to wide mid-on region
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 2 runs full and outside off stump, driven to left of sweeper cover

Hopes to Chanderpaul, 3 runs leans across, goes down on his knee to slog-sweep a short of length delivery to deep backward square leg region where David Hussey makes a fine stop near the ropes. He throws the ball into play and dives over the ropes.
Hopes to Findlay, no run slanted across, cutting away, pushed to extra cover.
Hopes to Findlay, no run short in length, cutting away from Findlay who tries to punch hard but mistimes the shot to mid-off.
Hopes to Findlay, no run fuller, the slow off cutter, trying to trap him lbw but Findlay gets his bat around the pad and turns to square leg. Three dot balls.
Hopes to Findlay, no run One more as he mistimes a pull to midwicket. He shakes his head as he walks across to have a chat with Chanderpaul
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run short in length, coming in to Chanderpaul who short-arm pulls to deep backward square leg.

Lee to Findlay, 1 run yorker length delivery on the off and middle, Findlay was ready this time and digs it out towards mid-off and rushes across for the single. Chanderpaul back on strike. 26 from 28. Lee rushes in.
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run Ah ... the slower one, Chanderpaul checks his shot and laps it around the corner to fine leg for a single
Lee to Findlay, 1 run Another yorker, squeezed to square leg
Lee to Chanderpaul, (no ball) the yorker ends up as a low dipping full toss, pushed back to Lee who turns around quickly to confirm the bad news. Free hit coming up.
Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run clears the front leg, Lee fires it short and outside off, flat-batted to deep cover
Lee to Findlay, no run Bouncer. Findlay ducks in time. End of the Lee over.
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run full and well outside the off stump, Chanderpaul presses across to slice it to covers
Hopes to Findlay, no run on a length, pushed across FIndlay who dabs to backward point. He was looking for a single but there is none.

Hopes to Findlay, SIX runs Omg! Findlay goes down town. After dabbing around, trying to get the single to get Chanderpaul on strike and failing, he decides to go for the jugular. He thrust his front foot and lifted a full delivery over long-on. Hop
Hopes to Findlay, 1 run mistimes a pull past midwicket
Hopes to Chanderpaul, 1 run leans forward to drive to long-off. One to go this over. What will Findlay do?
Hopes to Findlay, no run off cutter, moves past the forward prod, strikes Ronchi's pad and hits the sticks.

Lee to Chanderpaul, 1 run the slower one outside off, from round the stumps, dabbed to right of third man. The throw comes in and FIndlay tries to steal a extra run for the over throw but Chanderpaul sends him back

Lee to Findlay, OUT What a stunner from Michael Hussey at midwicket. The game swings around once more. Findlay tries to force a full length delivery and it flies off the inner half well to the left of Hussey who dives full stretch with his left arm

Lee to Ramdin, no run How did that yorker miss the off stump. Lee can't believe it. He looks past the batsman, waiting for the bails to fall. No luck. Ramdin was late in getting the bat down, the yorker just escapes the bottom edge and rushes past
Lee to Ramdin, no run Another searing yorker, stabbed to midwicket. Superb bowling at the death.
Lee to Ramdin, no run full and fast, squeezed to the off side.
Lee to Ramdin, no run Full and outside off, swing and a miss. Lee's ten overs are over.

Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 leg bye walks across the stumps, Bracken bowls the slow yorker, Chanderpaul can't connect with the waft across the line and is struck on the pad just outside off. They shout for the lbw. Bucknor shakes his head and signa
Bracken to Ramdin, 1 run the captain Clarke misfields a delivery hit straight to him at backward point . Hmm...
Bracken to Chanderpaul, 1 run turns a slower one to fine leg. 9 from 9.
Bracken to Ramdin, 1 run on a length, around off, cut down to left of backward point. Clarke fields this time and has a shy at the non-striker's end. Misses but the batsman was home anyway.
Bracken to Chanderpaul, no run another one released with the scrambled seam, worked to midwicket. No run.

Bracken to Chanderpaul, OUT The death rattle. Chanderpaul goes down on his knee and tries to swing the slow off cutter, misses and the off stump is pegged back. Bracken roars. The crowd sigh. Darren Sammy walks out to join Ramdin. Game is on the kn
Watson to Ramdin, 1 run homing in on the off stump, cut to cover point for a single.
Watson to Sammy, 1 run short in length and outside off stump ,cut to deep point for a single. Gayle is sitting on the staircase to the dressing room and looks at the action.
Watson to Ramdin, 1 run fuller, on the middle, clears the front foot and drives to long-on. Clarke has a chat with Watto. More advice from the crowd.
Watson to Sammy, 1 run The slower one, full in length and pushed to mid-on region. The crowd check the scoreboard. Four from two.

Watson to Ramdin, 1 run Ramdin can only get a single from a mistimed pull to square leg where Hopes makes a tumbling stop. Aussies hustle till the very end. Three from 1. Sammy looks up to the skies. Watson waits at the top of the run up

Watson to Sammy, 1 run Australia have won! just a single to covers. Low dipping full toss on the middle, hit straight to Clarke. Gayle is dejected and stares in to the distance. The Aussies are in a huddle. They break away and walk towards the pavi
That's it from us. Good bye and Good luck.
Stay on for the quotes from the post-match ceremony.
Australia won by 1 run
Player of the match is Andrew Symonds, AUS
